channel.title: [Client] Start
channel.description:
Hey, i'm not good to work with bat but i have this problem.
in my folder i have a folder with all the files, i just wants to open the Start client and it runs...
@echo off bin ./files/ Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
what is wrong ?

item.title: [Client] Start
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

[quote=“drachtpkz123, post:4, topic:325903”][quote author=Yorchi elite link=topic=422312.msg3099937#msg3099937 date=1263646497]
Hey, i’m not good to work with bat but i have this problem.

in my folder i have a folder with all the files, i just wants to open the Start client and it runs…

Fixed thanks

@echo off
bin ./files/
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

what is wrong ?
[/quote]

change it to :

@echo off
cd files
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit[/quote]

Read full topic
